info.title: They Said So - Say it with style
info.description: They Said So has more than 1 million+ quotes in the database, the largest such database in the world. And Quotes API gives easy way to access the data. Random quotes, quote of the day and bible verses are all accessible from this simple REST API.

get.description: List of authors available in the system
List of Random Quote Categories Available in the system

parameters.name: author
parameters.description: Random quote from the given author

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Category(tag) from which you want the resulting quote from

parameters.name: minlength
parameters.description: Minimum required length of the resulting quote

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Query String to query. These words will be searched in the quote and the matched quotes will be returned.

parameters.name: book
parameters.description: Which book you want the verse from?

parameters.name: chapter
parameters.description: Which chapter of the book you need the random verse from?
